## Summary | 摘要

Brief description of the changes in this PR.

簡要描述此 PR 中的變更。

## Type of Change | 變更類型

- [ ] `feat`: New feature or standard | 新功能或標準
- [ ] `fix`: Bug fix | 錯誤修復
- [ ] `docs`: Documentation update | 文件更新
- [ ] `refactor`: Code refactoring | 程式碼重構
- [ ] `test`: Test changes | 測試變更
- [ ] `chore`: Maintenance | 維護任務
- [ ] `style`: Formatting changes | 格式變更

## Related Issues | 相關 Issues

Closes #

## Testing | 測試

Describe how you tested these changes:

描述您如何測試這些變更：

- [ ] Ran `npm test` in `cli/` directory | 在 `cli/` 目錄執行 `npm test`
- [ ] Ran `npm run lint` in `cli/` directory | 在 `cli/` 目錄執行 `npm run lint`
- [ ] Tested manually | 手動測試

## Checklist | 檢查清單

### Code Quality | 程式碼品質
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards | 我的程式碼遵循專案的編碼標準
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code | 我已對我的程式碼進行自我審查
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings | 我的變更沒有產生新的警告

### Documentation | 文件
- [ ] I have updated documentation if needed | 如有需要，我已更新文件
- [ ] For core standard changes: I have updated both English and zh-TW versions | 核心規範變更：我已更新英文和繁體中文版本
- [ ] I have run `./scripts/check-translation-sync.sh` if applicable | 如適用，我已執行翻譯同步檢查

### Testing | 測試
- [ ] I have added tests for new features | 我已為新功能添加測試
- [ ] All existing tests pass | 所有現有測試通過

Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

添加截圖以幫助說明您的變更。

Any additional information that reviewers should know.

審查者應該知道的任何其他資訊。
